name: IA interactive
tagline: Digital Agency in Mexico City, Mexico
description:
IA Interactive is a full-service digital agency with over 140 different talents including strategists, creatives, developers, designers, social media ninjas, UX designers, consumers understanding experts, engineers, media analysts - dedicated to helping clients drive their business through interactive marketing. 

We believe that the role of technology is to solve what is complex, unpleasant and bothering in life, a vision we stay faithful to when helping brands stay relevant in these fast-changing times and while creating transformation solutions.
 
READ MORE...

locations.address: Av. Las Cañadas 501 – 500 Tres Marias Morelia
